Translations.Text: Prout pro 1 qui maintained eam virginity nos blew eam noster anima sic nos factus eam eam filius portent the whole saeculum
Tuus congregation est 1 congregation ego alone est tuus Dominus; vos worship Me alone
they divided disputing religionis. Totus de them advenit nos judgment
Prout pro those work righteousness dum believing their work non iit waste nos actum it
It forbidden any community nos annihilated return
Non Gog Magog reappear testimentum they tunc return - they advenit omnis direction
Est when inevitable prophecy advenit pass disbelievers stare in horror Woe to nos nos est oblivious! Indeed nos est wicked
Vos idols vos worship besides DEUS testimentum est fuel Hell; hoc est tuus inevitable destiny
those est deus they non finis Hell. totus its habitans abide it forever
They sigh groan therein they non habet access any news
Prout pro those deserved noster magnificent rewards they protected ex it
